thread.title: White House to reveal opioid plan seeking death penalty for dealers

title: White House to reveal opioid plan seeking death penalty for dealers
text:
White House to reveal opioid plan seeking death penalty for dealers 5:51am EDT - 01:18 
U.S. President Donald Trump to seek death penalty for some drug dealers as part of his long-awaited plan to tackle America's deadly opioid addiction epidemic, which claims tens of thousands of lives due to overdose every year.   
U.S. President Donald Trump to seek death penalty for some drug dealers as part of his long-awaited plan to tackle America's deadly opioid addiction epidemic, which claims tens of thousands of lives due to overdose every year.  //reut.rs/2IAraJj
